item.title: Second Lesson October 2020
item.description: Second Lesson Welcome to the second lesson - 12/10/2020 9:00 - 12:00 Zoom meeting We will use Zoom. You can connect to zoom: following this link: (https://grenoble-inp.zoom.us/j/91637254513?pwd=ejB2K0ZYbHZTL0xGNHUyTU5sUDI0UT09) (and, if needed, install the zoom app). or you can start the Zoom app with the following information meeting ID: 916 3725 4513 Password: ECO3 Class platforms Depending on the teacher, we will use Caseine I (IragaÃ«l Joly) will try to maintain this blog as a plateform to merge all information and connect to the Caseine and Chamilo plateforms.

item.title: First Lesson October 1rst 2020
item.description: First Lesson Welcome to the first lesson - 05/10/2020 9:00 - 12:00 Introduction These Introduction slides present: Table of contents Introduction Program Motivations Importance of DCM Course Objectives General Context of Choice analysis Four broad frameworks Sample and Measurement Issues in Model Building R and Tests for Categorical Data Inference for a (Single) Proportion Two-Way Contingency Tables The Odds-Ratio Chi-Squared Tests of Independence Zoom meeting We will use Zoom.
